verses.t: It is{G4851} not{G3756} expedient{G4851} for{G1063} me{G3427} doubtless{G1211} to glory{G2744}. I will come{G2064} to{G1519} visions{G3701} and{G2532} revelations{G602} of the Lord{G2962}.

I knew{G1492} a man{G444} in{G1722} Christ{G5547} above{G4253} fourteen{G1180} years ago{G2094}, (whether{G1535} in{G1722} the body{G4983}, I{G1492} cannot{G3756} tell{G1492}; or whether{G1535} out of{G1622} the body{G3588}, I{G1492} cannot{G3756} tell{G1492}: God{G3588} knoweth{G1492};) such an one{G5108} caught up{G726} to{G2193} the third{G5154} heaven{G3772}.
And{G2532} I knew{G1492} such{G5108} a man{G444}, (whether{G1535} in{G1722} the body{G4983}, or{G1535} out of{G1622} the body{G3588}, I{G1492} cannot{G3756} tell{G1492}: God{G3588} knoweth{G1492};)

How that{G3754} he was caught up{G726} into{G1519} paradise{G3588}, and{G2532} heard{G191} unspeakable{G731} words{G4487}, which{G3739} it is{G1832} not{G3756} lawful{G1832} for a man{G444} to utter{G2980}.
Of{G5228} such an one{G5108} will I glory{G2744}: yet{G1161} of{G5228} myself{G1683} I will{G2744} not{G3756} glory{G2744}, but{G1487} in{G1722} mine{G3450} infirmities{G3588}.

For{G1063} though{G1437} I would desire{G2309} to glory{G2744}, I shall{G2071} not{G3756} be{G2071} a fool{G878}; for{G1063} I will say{G2046} the truth{G225}: but{G1161} now I forbear{G5339}, lest{G3361} any man{G5100} should think{G3049} of{G1519} me{G1691} above{G5228} that which{G3739} he seeth{G991} me{G3165} to be, or{G2228} that he heareth{G191} of{G1537} me{G1700}.

And{G2532} lest{G2443} I should be exalted above measure{G5229} through the abundance{G3588} of the revelations{G3588}, there was given{G1325} to me{G3427} a thorn{G4647} in the flesh{G3588}, the messenger{G32} of Satan{G4566} to{G2443} buffet{G2852} me{G3165}, lest{G2443} I should be exalted above measure{G5229}.
For{G5228} this thing{G5127} I besought{G3870} the Lord{G3588} thrice{G5151}, that{G2443} it might depart{G868} from{G575} me{G1700}.

And{G2532} he said{G2046} unto me{G3427}, My{G3450}grace{G3588} is sufficient{G714} for thee{G4671}: for{G1063} my{G3450} strength{G1411} is made perfect{G5048} in{G1722} weakness{G769}. Most gladly{G2236} therefore{G3767} will I{G2744} rather{G3123} glory{G2744} in{G1722} my{G3450} infirmities{G3588}, that{G2443} the power{G3588} of Christ{G3588} may rest{G1981} upon{G1909} me{G1691}.

Therefore{G1352} I take pleasure{G2106} in{G1722} infirmities{G769}, in{G1722} reproaches{G5196}, in{G1722} necessities{G318}, in{G1722} persecutions{G1375}, in{G1722} distresses{G4730} for{G5228} Christ's sake{G5547}: for{G1063} when{G3752} I am weak{G770}, then{G5119} am I{G1510} strong{G1415}.

I am become{G1096} a fool{G878} in glorying{G2744}; ye{G5210} have compelled{G315} me{G3165}: for{G1063} I{G1473} ought{G3784} to have been commended{G4921} of{G5259} you{G5216}: for{G1063} in nothing{G3762} am I behind{G5302} the very{G5228} chiefest{G3029} apostles{G652}, though{G1487} I be{G1510} nothing{G3762}.

Truly{G3303} the signs{G4592} of an apostle{G3588} were wrought{G2716} among{G1722} you{G5213} in{G1722} all{G3956} patience{G5281}, in{G1722} signs{G4592}, and{G2532} wonders{G5059}, and{G2532} mighty deeds{G1411}.

For{G1063} what{G5101} is{G2076} it wherein{G3739} ye were inferior{G2274} to{G5228} other{G3062} churches{G1577}, except{G1487} it be that{G3754} I{G1473} myself{G846} was{G2655} not{G3756} burdensome{G2655} to you{G5216}? forgive{G5483} me{G3427} this{G3778} wrong{G3588}.

Behold{G2400}, the third time{G5154} I am{G2192} ready{G2093} to come{G2064} to{G4314} you{G5209}; and{G2532} I will{G2655} not{G3756} be burdensome{G2655} to you{G5216}: for{G1063} I seek{G2212} not{G3756} yours{G5216}, but{G235} you{G5209}: for{G1063} the children{G3588} ought{G3784} not{G3756} to lay up{G2343} for the parents{G3588}, but{G235} the parents{G3588} for the children{G3588}.

And{G1161} I{G1473} will very gladly{G2236} spend{G1159} and{G2532} be spent{G1550} for{G5228} you{G5216}; though{G1487} the more abundantly{G4056} I love{G25} you{G5209}, the less{G2276} I be loved{G25}.
But{G1161} be it so{G2077}, I{G1473} did{G2599} not{G3756} burden{G2599} you{G5209}: nevertheless{G235}, being{G5225} crafty{G3835}, I caught{G2983} you{G5209} with guile{G1388}.
Did{G3361} I make a gain{G4122} of{G4314} you{G5209} by{G1223} any{G5100} of them{G846} whom{G3739} I sent{G649} unto you{G5209}?

I desired{G3870} Titus{G5103}, and{G2532} with{G4882} him I sent{G4882} a brother{G3588}. Did{G3361} Titus{G5103} make a gain{G4122} of you{G5209}? walked we{G4043} not{G3756} in the same{G846} spirit{G4151}? walked we not{G3756} in the same{G846} steps{G2487}?

Again{G3825}, think ye{G1380} that{G3754} we excuse ourselves{G626} unto you{G5213}? we speak{G2980} before{G2714} God{G3588} in{G1722} Christ{G5547}: but{G1161} we do all things{G3956}, dearly beloved{G27}, for{G5228} your{G5216} edifying{G3619}.

For{G1063} I fear{G5399}, lest{G3381}, when I come{G2064}, I shall{G2147} not{G3756} find{G2147} you{G5209} such as{G3634} I would{G2309}, and{G2504} that I{G2504} shall be found{G2147} unto you{G5213} such as{G3634} ye would{G2309} not{G3756}: lest{G3381} there be debates{G2054}, envyings{G2205}, wraths{G2372}, strifes{G2052}, backbitings{G2636}, whisperings{G5587}, swellings{G5450}, tumults{G181}:

And lest{G3361}, when I come{G2064} again{G3825}, my{G3450} God{G3588} will humble{G5013} me{G3165} among{G4314} you{G5209}, and{G2532} that I shall bewail{G3996} many{G4183} which{G3588} have sinned already{G4258}, and{G2532} have{G3340} not{G3361} repented{G3340} of{G1909} the uncleanness{G3588} and{G2532} fornication{G4202} and{G2532} lasciviousness{G766} which{G3739} they have committed{G4238}.
